Class XReportDAO

java.lang.Object
project2.XReportDAO
public class XReportDAO extends Object
Simple class to handle all X- and Z-Report generation.

Provides classes for holding various data and helper functions to generate data necessary to display on reports.

    • getHourlySalesData

      public static List<XReportDAO.HourlySales> getHourlySalesData(LocalDate date) throws SQLException
      Get hourly sales data for a specific date by querying DB through DatabaseConnection class.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to query (null for today)
      Returns:
      List of hourly sales data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if unable to connect to DB or perform query
      See Also:
      • DatabaseConnection

    • getDailyTotals

      public static XReportDAO.DailyTotals getDailyTotals(LocalDate date) throws SQLException
      Gets the total daily sales given a certain date. Uses DatabaseConnection to query the DB and return all sales data for a particular day.
      Parameters:
      date - date to get sales data for
      Returns:
      DailyTotals object with relevant sales data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if unable to connect to DB or perform query
      See Also:
      • DatabaseConnection

    • getTopSellingItems

      public static List<XReportDAO.TopItem> getTopSellingItems(LocalDate date, int limit) throws SQLException
      Gets top selling items given a certain date and a limit on the number of items. Uses DatabaseConnection to query DB and return relevant data.
      Parameters:
      date - date to get top items for
      limit - limit as to how many items to show
      Returns:
      list of TopItem given criteria
      Throws:
      SQLException - if unable to connect to DB or perform query
      See Also:
      • DatabaseConnection

    • generateXReportText

      public static String generateXReportText(LocalDate date, boolean empty) throws SQLException
      Generate a formatted X-Report for particular date. Uses all the helper functions defined previously to produce a plain-text report to be used elsewhere.
      Parameters:
      date - date for which to generate report
      empty - whether report is blank or not (for reset purposes)
      Returns:
      String of X-Report
      Throws:
      SQLException - if unable to connect to DB or perform query

    • generateZReportText

      public static String generateZReportText(LocalDate date, boolean empty) throws SQLException
      Generate a formatted Z-Report for particular date. Uses all the helper functions defined previously to produce a plain-text report to be used elsewhere.
      Parameters:
      date - date for which to generate report
      empty - whether report is blank or not (for reset purposes)
      Returns:
      String of Z-Report
      Throws:
      SQLException - if unable to connect to DB or perform query
